items.name: Gombe Heritage & Arts Centre
items.short_description: Discover the rich cultural tapestry of Gombe through interactive exhibits, traditional performances, and local craft workshops, celebrating the state's vibrant history.
items.address: Along Gombe-Potiskum Road, opposite Central Mosque, Gombe

items.name: Gombe Green Oasis Park
items.short_description: A serene urban park featuring beautifully landscaped gardens, winding walking trails, and family-friendly picnic spots, perfect for relaxation and outdoor activities.
items.address: Tudun Wada Area, off Bello Sabo Road, Gombe

items.name: Future Science Hub Gombe
items.short_description: An interactive science museum designed to inspire young minds with hands-on exhibits in robotics, astronomy, and sustainable energy, fostering a love for discovery.
items.address: Near Gombe State University, Kwami LGA

items.name: Kumo Hills Eco-Adventure
items.short_description: Experience thrilling hiking trails, breathtaking panoramic viewpoints, and guided nature walks through the scenic and unspoiled Kumo Hills, ideal for adventurers.
items.address: Kumo LGA, along Gombe-Yola Road, Gombe State

items.name: Gombe Modern Crafts Market
items.short_description: A vibrant and newly established marketplace showcasing authentic Gombe crafts, textiles, and traditional delicacies from talented local artisans.
items.address: Along Biu Road, adjacent to Gombe Main Market

items.name: Dukku Family Fun Centre
items.short_description: A modern entertainment complex offering exciting bowling lanes, arcade games, a soft play area for kids, and a variety of delicious food vendors for a fun-filled day.

items.name: Dadin Kowa Dam Viewpoint & Gardens
items.short_description: Enjoy breathtaking panoramic views of the magnificent Dadin Kowa Dam from specially designed viewpoints, surrounded by newly cultivated botanical gardens.
items.address: Dadin Kowa Town, Yamaltu Deba LGA

items.name: Gombe Sports Arena & Recreation Park
items.short_description: A newly built multi-sport complex boasting state-of-the-art pitches for football, basketball courts, and a public gym, promoting active and healthy lifestyles.
items.address: Along Gombe Bypass Road, near Federal Teaching Hospital, Gombe

items.name: Gombe Contemporary Art Gallery
items.short_description: A vibrant space showcasing modern and contemporary artworks by emerging and established Nigerian artists, focusing on Gombe's unique cultural perspectives.
items.address: Adjacent to Gombe State Library, Federal Low-Cost Estate

items.name: Gombe Food Street Hub
items.short_description: A bustling collection of diverse food stalls and restaurants offering local delicacies, international cuisine, and a lively evening atmosphere for culinary exploration.
items.address: Off Ashaka Road, close to Pantami Mosque, Gombe
